snippet: David Akers said he received the death threats on Twitter and closed the account.
abstract: NFL Roundup; San Francisco 49ers kicker David Akers says he received death threats on Twitter and closed the account; says he received the threats last month, but was unsure about number received because he did not go further back on his account to count; other NFL news noted.

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and BEN SHPIGEL

lead_paragraph: David Akers said he received the death threats on Twitter and closed the account.
